name: Adding an item to a list with other items in Cucumber
scenarioId: classpath:features/cucumber/record_todos/add_new_items_to_the_todo_list:Adding an item to a list with other items in Cucumber
methodName: Adding an item to a list with other items in Cucumber

testSteps.description: Given that Jane has a todo list containing Buy some milk, Walk the dog

children.description: Jane starts with a todo list containing Buy some milk, Walk the dog
Jane adds the todo items called: [Buy some milk, Walk the dog]
Jane adds a todo item called: Buy some milk
Jane enters 'Buy some milk' then hits [RETURN] into 'What needs to be done?' field
Jane adds a todo item called: Walk the dog
Jane enters 'Walk the dog' then hits [RETURN] into 'What needs to be done?' field

testSteps.description: When she adds 'Buy some cereal' to her list

children.description: she adds a todo item called: Buy some cereal
she enters 'Buy some cereal' then hits [RETURN] into 'What needs to be done?' field

testSteps.description: Then her todo list should contain Buy some milk, Walk the dog, Buy some cereal

children.description: Then the items displayed should be ([Buy some milk, Walk the dog, Buy some cereal])

userStory.narrative:
In order to avoid having to remember things that need doing
  As a forgetful person
  I want to be able to record what I need to do in a place where I won't forget about them

title: Adding an item to a list with other items in Cucumber
